Text: Thanks a lot! I've been looking a long time for this movie

For god's sake, also link back to cineastklubben!

http://www.piratbyran.org/index.php?view=forum&a=thread&id=20519&fview=1

And tag the little darling with "[CiN]" while we're at it. Let's hope search covers comments as well.

I have the original German version on vhs, it has been recorded from German television a long time ago. Appears identical to this one with English titles, same running time, colour screens. The title cards match the German original cards very well indeed although it of course it is in English.

This is the film that made Louis Bunuel realise that he must be a filmmaker.
(Read his extraordinary autobiography!)
...and dont u complain about my spelling!!
